landing_introduction: You need to use this icons template that is modern and simply design.

item1.title: Open Source
item1.description: As an open source project, Quark Icons is always striving for excellence.

item2.title: Modern
item2.description: Add sophistication to your application with modern designs.

item3.title: Quality
item3.description: Quark Icons is always committed to delivering high quality.

app_contributing_description: Try a contributing, would you like to contribute to icon creation? Detailed guidelines are provided below!
app_contributing_style_guide_description: This open-source project aims to create and maintain icons with a consistent design! Therefore, please refer to the guide to ensure a cohesive icon style.
app_contributing_github_description: To complete the icon creation and officially integrate it into the project, you will need to use GitHub!
app_search_placeholder: Enter a name of icons and keywords or alias
app_search_results_none_description: An icon with a given name does not exist.
app_search_popup_normal_description: Set to the icon that is line style.
app_search_popup_filled_description: Set to the icon that is fill style.
app_settings_description: Set the overall functionality and options of this website.
app_credits_description: A big thank you to all the contributors who have made the Quark Icons open source project possible! The following information details the contributions and provides further project-related information.

sign-in.description: Sign in to experience more features!
sign-in.invalid_email: A given email is not exists.
sign-in.invalid_alias: A given alias is not exists.

sign-up.info_description: Enter the user information you want to create.
sign-up.already_exists_email: The account with this email already exists.
sign-up.already_exists_alias: The account with this alias already exists.
